channel.title: Developer Tools
channel.description:
[center][size=16pt][b]Developer Tools Revised List[/b][/size]
[b]Source and Server Protection[/b] [url=http://free.grisoft.com/doc/1]AVG Anti-Virus Free Edition[/url] [url=http://www.thegreatpuzzle.com/superstorm.php]Super Storm[/url] [url=http://www.microsoft.com]Windows Defender[/url] [b]Source Editing[/b] [url=http://www.eclipse.org]Eclipse[/url] [url=http://www.netbeans.org]NetBeans[/url] [url=http://www.jedit.org]iEdit[/url] [url=http://armedbear-j.sourceforge.net/]J[/url] [url=http://www.drjava.org]DrJava.com[/url] [url=http://www.bluej.org]BlueJ[/url] [url=http://www.editpadpro.com]EditPad Lite[/url] [url=http://notepad-plus.sourceforge.net/uk/site.htm]Notepad++[/url] [url=http://www.winmerge.org]Winmerge[/url] [b]Server Site Management[/b] [url=http://www.sqlmanager.net]SQL Manager Lite[/url] [url=http://gallery.menalto.com]Gallery 2[/url] [b]Server Management, Networking, Mobility, and Connectivity[/b] [url=http://www.handcraftedsoftware.org]Free Proxy[/url] [url=http://www.hamachi.cc]Hamachi[/url] [url=http://www.no-ip.org]No-Ip[/url] [b]Server Remote Access[/b] [url=http://www.logmein.com]LogMein[/url] [url=http://www.uvnc.com]Ultra VNC[/url] [b]Developer to Developer Communications[/b] [url=http://www.skype.com]Skype[/url] [url=http://www.pidgin.im]Pidgin[/url] [url=http://www.poptray.org]PopTray[/url] [b]Server and Source Backup[/b] [url=http://www.mozy.com]Mozy[/url] [url=http://www.getgspace.com]Gmail Space[/url] [b]Screen Shots[/b] [url=http://www.irfanview.com]Irfanview[/url] [url=http://www.gimp.org]Gimp[/url] [url=http://www.mirekw.com/winfreeware/mwsnap.html]MWSnap[/url]
[center]

item.title: Developer Tools
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

FastBawlz:

… GIMP doesn’t fit in “Screen Shots” … More like a Editing Program?

I thought GIMP was a bit like photoshop to edit photos. But yeah, it would probably be in both as it involves pictures.

Read full topic
